long_description: The GoPro Wi-Fi Remote mounting kit offers several attachment options to keep your Wi-Fi remote secure and readily accessible while you engage in video-worthy outdoor fun. Includes a rip-and-stick attachment strap, lanyard, quick-release mount, curved adhesive mount and flat adhesive mount. GoPro Wi-Fi Remote mounting kit includes 2 attachment keys with key rings; this special key makes it easy to attach Wi-Fi remote to your other keys, a lanyard, strap or zipper.
short_description: The GoPro Wi-Fi Remote mounting kit offers several attachment options to keep your Wi-Fi remote secure and readily accessible while you engage in video-worthy outdoor fun.
